Yeah but no one is supporting it and the government tries to stop it.

Marry a dog if you want, a cow if you want, marry yourself if you don't find anyone good enough for yourself. 

[You don't need a prince to be a princess](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-41413297) or [if you are sick of men](https://hotinjuba.com/south-sudanese-woman-marries-herself-claims-she-is-sick-of-men/). [Marry man's best friend if the man isn't good enough for you.](https://indianexpress.com/article/trending/bizarre/woman-marries-her-dog-on-live-tv-netizens-are-not-impressed-5865818/)

Inaction in being complicit too. There have been no actions against the rapists or the myriad of caste discriminators. Our hands are not clean. If we keep portraying ourselves as lands of lesser evils than these evils will perpetrate in our lands.
Marrying an animal is not consensual. It's like getting them married forcefully.  So not the fan of that.

I am not, I am not proud that Nepal is better than other South Asian countries cause that's not a thing to be proud of, I think it's about how in our media there's no platform for people who are openly discriminatory like in other countries which is a good thing in the long run . Caste discrimination is prevelant mostly among loser teens aswell and with kids whose parents teach them to be discriminatory. I know this is an anecdotal evidence but the ones I know that discriminate against other caste are loser teens who liked newaris and the newari girl didn't like em back or their parents compared them to teraivaasis or their crush's boyfriend is from Terai.
And I am not going to be a judge of that, as long as the animal is loved and not harmed in any way.

But you'd mind if someone married someone else without their consent, wouldn't you? Would you still say 'as long as that person is loved and not harmed been any way'? Animals should not to be experimented for people's amusement or desires.

Bruh I'm a leftist. I don't like the state our country is in but atleast we bully people who discriminate and we don't give them platform. Plus our leaders are ideologues who I hope that with pressure from us will do something. Mainly spreading awareness in radios and in newspaper and TVs and also they could like shoot one lyncher to show that there is 0 tolerance for caste discrimination which will make these people scared

I doubt it's an experiment. Maybe a fun way for people to show their love for their pets. And they wouldn't be doing it if it affected the pets in any way, unless they are doing it on TikTok for views. Once the ceremony is over things just go back to normal I think.
